p: To examine the differences between the essential oils’ components prepared from different Ferula species, the data collected from the different GC-MS spectra were subjected to chemometric analysis of unsupervised pattern recognition represented by PCA, which was processed by employing Unscrambler 9.7 (CAMO SA, Oslo, Norway) [ 28, 32]. Meanwhile, other statistical analyses used for biological assessment were performed using ANOVA assay (with Tukey’s test, significant value: p < 0.05) and Xlstat 2017 software.
